channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: European Tech Giant Cuts Off U.S. Subsidiary After Multimillion Dollar ICE Contract
item.description: ICE is enlisting ten companies for a widespread immigrant surveillance program.

item.title: ‘Upgrade’ Producer Dishes On the TV Sequel That Almost Was
item.description: The cult classic 'Upgrade' almost got a continuation with a TV show, but real-world events kept getting in its way.

item.title: Emails Show Even Epstein Thought Crypto Pumps are Unethical
item.description: In 2018, Epstein wrote that because he is "high profile" he had concerns about the "questionable ethics" of crypto pumps if he was involved.

item.title: The Samsung QN90F is our 'best TV for viewing sports,' and the 65-inch model is $1,000 off ahead of the Super Bowl
item.description: Samsung's QN90F QLED is TechRadar's best TV for watching sports, and the 65-inch model is on sale for its lowest price yet ahead of the Super Bowl.

item.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
item.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

item.title: Apple is already thinking about its second foldable iPhone, and it may be a clamshell
item.description: We may not have a concrete release date for the first foldable iPhone, but Apple may already be looking into a smaller device that will follow it up. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple is exploring a "square, clamshell-style foldable phone," with the caveat that this potential device is "far from guaranteed to reach the market" and only "under consideration" right now. If this eventually leads to a smaller foldable iPhone, that means Apple believes it can compete against existing options on the market, including Samsung's latest Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Motorola's revamped Razr foldable. G...

item.title: GRAMMYs 2026 Live Streams: How to watch awards ceremony online from anywhere
item.description: Will Kendrick be crowned king of the 68th Grammy Awards? Here's how to watch the Grammys 2026 online no matter where you are this weekend – and for free.

item.title: Alpha Impulsion : le pari de la propulsion autophage (interview exclusive)
item.description: La start-up française Alpha Impulsion se distingue par sa technologie innovante de propulsion autophage, promettant un transport spatial plus propre et durable. Elle vient de remporter le prix de l’innovation de rupture pour les solutions européennes de lancement. Lors d'une interview, Marius...

item.title: Matthew Lillard Is Happy Netflix Is Bringing ‘Scooby-Doo’ Back
item.description: After a couple of years being shelved or not used properly, Netflix might be just what 'Scooby-Doo' needs.

item.title: Apple Leadership Is Quietly Getting AI-Pilled, Report Claims
item.description: Is Apple getting ready for its big AI push?
